Welcome.title: Welcome
Welcome.description: Speak with Nikkolas, he should be in the townhall
preQuestDialogue: Hello! We saw your application for the job. You are welcomed to the Abyssal Key island
From now on it's the start of your trial period.
The situation on the island is quite worrying -
fish populations are collapsing, waters are polluted by factories, and the locals are divided between survival and sustainability.
Your goal is to make choices that will determine the island's future.
Talk to me when you will be ready to start.
Right now you can go to the seashore next to my house, north-east of the island and meet my friend Jorge. He will introduce you to your first quest.
completionDialogue: Hi, nice to meet you! Talk to me again if you want to try something new.

Fishing.title: Fishing
Fishing.description: Meet Jorge next to Nikkolas's house
preQuestDialogue: Hello! I'm Jorge, a local fisherman. For fifty years I've watched this island changing, and I've seen how overfishing has made things tougher for everyone. I always try to fish in a sustainable way, but it means less food and money these days. Would you like to join me today? Choice: yes/no.
You have two choices:
Fish sustainably in approved areas. It's better for the ocean, but you'll catch fewer fish and earn less profit - go to the furthest ocean (1).
Fish in restricted zones. There are more fish here, but it harms the environment and breaks the rules - go to the nearest ocean (2).
Choose your approach. (say "1" or "2")
Type "fish" to start fishing.
You put a worm on your hook. Drop the line into the water. Wait for a fish to bite...
You've got a fish! Add to inventory? Choice: yes/no
Wow, you've got another fish! Choice: yes/no
Three in a row? Amazing! 3 good fish you got there. Choice: yes/no
No more luck today... Return to Jorge.
completionDialogue: Jorge: Good job! Thank you for your help. One of my friends is also waiting for you, you can find him on the boat.
Jorge: I would have chosen the other way, but thank you anyway! I know someone you might like; you can find him near the ocean with preserved corals and animals.

Fishing on the boat.title: Fishing on the boat
Fishing on the boat.description: Decide with Nikolja whether to use nets or rods
preQuestDialogue: Hey there! I'm Nikolja, another fisherman here like Jorge. I'm about to head out and fish from my boat. We can use a net and catch lots of fish, but sometimes other animals get hurt too. Or, we can use fishing rods, catch fewer fish, and avoid harming other creatures. Which way should we go? Choice: net (1) / rods (2).
Type "fish" to start the process.
You prepared a net and threw it into water.
10 minutes have passed, the net is out.
You caught 50 fish! Add to the inventory? Choice: yes/no.
You prepared rods and started fishing.
10 minutes passed.
You've got a fish! Add to the inventory? Choice: yes/no.
You've got a fish! Add to the inventory? Choice: yes/no.
No more luck today...
completionDialogue: Nikolja: Good job! However we also caught a turtle, it is going to die soon, but there is nothing we can do now. I know someone you might like though, you can find him near the ocean with preserved animals and corals!
Nikolja: Only a few fish, but it is still good! Now you can go to the seashore, someone wants to talk to you.

Poacher.title: Poacher
Poacher.description: Hear Santino's offer to fish illegally
preQuestDialogue: Hello, my name is Santino and I want to offer you a way to earn a lot of money. It will include illegal fishing, but I have been doing it for so long, no one ever found me here. Are you in? Choice: yes/no.
Type "fish" to start fishing.
Preparing rods...
Starting fishing...
You've got a fish! Add to the inventory? Choice: yes/no.
You've got a fish! Add to the inventory? Choice: yes/no.
You've got a fish! Add to the inventory? Choice: yes/no.
completionDialogue: Santino: Thank you! You can have all of it and go further to the seashore. See you later!
Santino: You can go further to the seashore now, but you will regret it later!

Help or sell.title: Help or sell
Help or sell.description: Decide whether to donate or sell your catch
preQuestDialogue: Hey! I'm Mariha. I'm only a little girl, but I want to help you. You've caught lots of fish, and now you get to choose what happens next. You can sell your fish at the local shop, or you can donate them to our charity center to help families who need food. My family has a hard time making money, because big companies keep taking more fish than we can. If you help us, I'd be so grateful. If you want to sell, head to the shop. If you want to help out, take your fish to the charity center. Thank you and see you soon!

Hey! I'm Mariha. I'm only a little girl, but I want to help you. You shouldn't have accepted Santino's offer, he is a well-known poacher here, but it doesn't matter anymore. You've caught lots of fish, and now you get to choose what happens next. You can sell your fish at the local shop, or you can donate them to our charity center to help families who need food. My family has a hard time making money, because big companies keep taking more fish than we can. If you help us, I'd be so grateful. If you want to sell, head to the shop. If you want to help out, take your fish to the charity center. Thank you and see you soon!

Hey! I'm Mariha. I'm only a little girl, but I want to help you. Good thing you haven't accepted Santino's offer, he is a well-known poacher here. You've caught lots of fish, and now you get to choose what happens next. You can sell your fish at the local shop, or you can donate them to our charity center to help families who need food. My family has a hard time making money, because big companies keep taking more fish than we can. If you help us, I'd be so grateful. If you want to sell, head to the shop. If you want to help out, take your fish to the charity center. Thank you and see you soon!

Sell fish.title: Sell fish
Sell fish.description: Sell your fish to the local shop
preQuestDialogue: Hey! Welcome to the local shop "Tuna Matata". I see that you came to sell your fish. Good choice!
Type "sell" to complete the transaction.
completionDialogue: All the fish was sold.
You got a great deal of money!
Artyom: Thank you! I will recommend you to my friend, who owns a factory here. Visit him at the Factory.

Charity.title: Charity
Charity.description: Donate your fish to the charity center
preQuestDialogue: Hello, you are welcomed to the charity center! Thank you for helping the villagers.
Type "donate" to donate fish.
completionDialogue: You have successfully donated your fish.
Phil: Thank you so much! We will remember your generosity. I heard that my friend Matias needs help at the recycling center, it would be so nice if you helped him out.

Recycling.title: Recycling
Recycling.description: Help Matias transport and sort trash
preQuestDialogue: Good afternoon and welcome to the recycling center! My name is Matias and I am responsible for sorting trash. The problem with ocean pollution is getting only worse and one way everyone could help is to sort the trash. Thank you for coming to help. Right now this center is being renovated, so I need to transport all the trash to the nearest bins, but they are quite far away - at the townhall. You can go now and on your way back visit the laboratory, my friend Lila needs your help! Otherwise she is not going to finish the research on time!
Type "pick up" to pick up all the trash.
Right now you have a choice: you can either follow the instructions or you can carry all the trash to the ocean and save some time - no one is gonna notice.
At the ocean: Type "leave" to throw trash into the ocean.
At the townhall: Type "sort" to recycle the trash.
completionDialogue: Uh oh! The cliff slope was too steep. You fell and passed away...
Thank you! All done!
Remember to visit Nikkolas!

Factory.title: Factory
preQuestDialogue: Hello, and welcome to my factory! We're having trouble managing all these leftovers. You can help by either dumping the waste into the ocean, like we sometimes do, or taking it to the recycling center instead. When you're finished, visit Nikkolas at his houseâ€”he will announce the decision about your stay here!
Type "pick up" to pick up all leftovers.
Now you can either go to the ocean or to the recycling center.
At the ocean: Type "leave" to throw trash into the ocean.
At the recycling center: Type "sort" to recycle the leftovers.
completionDialogue: Successfully threw all the trash into water!
All leftovers are utilized, thank you!
Remember to visit Nikkolas!

Marine biologist.title: Marine biologist
preQuestDialogue: Hey! I'm Lila - marine biologist at this laboratory. I am working on a research project about corals. I need help with collecting more samples. Could you help me please? Choice: yes/no.
Go to the ocean.
Type "collect" to collect coral samples.
You have three different coral types with you now! Go to Lila.
Type "give" to give them to Lila.
completionDialogue: Lila: Thank you so much for helping me! I hope I will finish soon and it will raise awareness about the problems our ocean is facing. Now go and visit Nikkolas at his house, he will announce the decision about your stay here!

Lila: I won't be able to finish on time now! Unfortunately, my laboratory will be closed... It was my way of trying to overcome global problems we are facing and now I can't do it anymore. Now go and visit Nikkolas at his house, he will announce the decision about your stay here!
